title: Favicons (Favorite icons)
items: In the head of the index.html => <link rel="shortcut icon" href="assets/img/handler-icon.ico" type="image/x-icon">

title: Icons
items: When you need to add icons -> <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons' rel='stylesheet'>

title: Local server
items: If you have node.js installed => npm install -g http-server
To check if you already have it installed => http-server --version
Then from the project folder => http-server
